item.title: Client-Side Interactivite Visulations
item.description: I love creating visualizations in R ðŸ’¹, its one of the first things that I do when exploring a new data set. One of the problems that I usually run into during an analysis is that I end up with a huge amount of plotsâ€¦â€¦ mid-analysis I get slowed down having to sift through throngs of plots that Iâ€™ve created. This is usually brought on for a number of reasons:
